source.name: The DataSF App Showcase
source.description: The DataSF App Showcase is a collection of applications that have been developed and built by individuals and organizations using datasets published by the City & County of San Francisco. The apps in this showcase are a tangible result from individuals & organizations having open access to city data. You can help improve the showcase by using and providing feedback on the applications, building your own application on the available datasets, and by letting us know what other datasets we should make available to the public.
